::KitKat/DarkMouse::

KitKat::

She emerged from the CR chamber and walked over to Drillbit.  She 
kissed him,"Thank you."  She smiled at him and walked down te hall 
towards the main room.  She took over the com-center and started 
working on the autogun ranges andhoping to expand them.  She looked 
on the scanner and saw a pod had crashed near the base and two bots 
where outside the pod, not moving from thier current location.
(GoldenEye and Dollen)
She spoke out to Drillbit.  "Hey, Drillbit.  I have a pod on the west 
side of the base.  Two bots near the pod.  You want to go and get 
them and bring them here?"

She scanned sigantures and smiled,"And they are Predacons.  Ah, more 
troops for Megatron. Yes, please go and get them. we may need them."


DarkMouse::

She looked at Quickstrike and then to Aracnia. "Look, Megatron isn't 
our friend. You heard the bug, he's mad.  When he gets mad, things 
get ugly."  She sniffed the air and could smell Megatron on the 
wind.  She knew, it was already to late.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron looked to Kitkat when Waspinator entered the 
cave. "Your in 
> command until my return. I want you to get rid of those 
invaders....failure 
> is not an option. I dont think I need to remind you. And tell 
Starscream if 
> he wants to join he had better pick up a blaster and shoot someone!"
>     He began to leave, but turned agian. "Waspinator, Atma, and 
Purseudo are 
> under you command as well as the others. Use it wisely."
>     He exited the cave and the fans slid out and he took to the sky 
heading 
> from the predacon bunker.
> 
>     "When will he get here?!!" Tarantulas demanded to Aracnia.
>     She turned to him, angry. "I dont know! But hes going to help 
us, despite 
> what Quickstrike and Darkmouse say. He should be here soon."
>     "Hah, so will the Aliens."
